ids_info.name: breeding_blanket
ids_info.description: Description of the breeding blanket and neutron shield (if any, the shield is considered as an additional layer of a given blanket module)

breeding_blanket/module.documentation: Set of modules composing the blanket

breeding_blanket/module/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

breeding_blanket/module/layer.documentation: Set of layers in the blanket module

breeding_blanket/module/layer/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

breeding_blanket/module/layer/material.documentation: Set of materials entering the composition of this layer

breeding_blanket/module/layer/material/i.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

breeding_blanket/module/layer/material_v.documentation: Volume fraction of each material entering the composition of this layer

breeding_blanket/module/layer/midplane_t.documentation: Thickness of this layer evaluated at the midplane

breeding_blanket/module/layer/time_slice.documentation: Dynamic quantities at various time slices
Nuclear heating power density in the layer, evaluated at midplane

breeding_blanket/module/cooling/coolant/.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

breeding_blanket/module/cooling/time_sli.documentation: Dynamic quantities at various time slices

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice.documentation: Dynamic quantities at various time slices

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice/midpl.documentation: Radial distance from the first wall evaluated at the midplane (0.0 at the first wall)
Nuclear heating power density in the module, evaluated at midplane

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice/escap.documentation: Maximum neutron flux escaping from the back of the blanket module

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice/wall_.documentation: Maximum neutron flux at the first wall

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice/power.documentation: Total incident neutron power on the blanket module
Total incident radiative power on the blanket module
Total thermal power that is extracted from the blanket module
Total neutron power (deposited + generated) in the blanket module
Total radiated power (incident - reflected) in the blanket module

breeding_blanket/module/time_slice/triti.documentation: Number of tritium atoms created for each fusion neutron (TBR)

breeding_blanket/time_slice.documentation: Dynamic quantities for a set of time_slices

breeding_blanket/time_slice/power_nuclea.documentation: Nuclear heating power on the blanket
Nuclear heating power on the shields

breeding_blanket/time_slice/tritium_bree.documentation: Number of tritium atoms created for each fusion neutron (TBR)

breeding_blanket/modules_pol_n.documentation: Number of blanket modules in a poloidal cross section

breeding_blanket/pb_li_volume.documentation: Volume of PbLi contained in the blanket

breeding_blanket/li6_fraction.documentation: Fraction of Li6 isotope over the total amount of Li in the blanket
